EmailTemplate.name: Reactivation Campaign Q417.Reactivation_Email_1
EmailTemplate.subject: We’re hoping some free stuff might win you back
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings from Pivotal! We noticed that you haven’t opened or clicked any of our emails in the past year, so we thought we’d check-in and offer up some reading materials (on us).
Feel free to peruse at your leisure:
- Crafting Your Cloud-Native Strategy <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/crafting-your-cloud-native-strategy]]> - Migrating to Cloud-Native Application Architectures <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures]]> - Beyond the 12 Factor App: Exploring the DNA of Highly Scalable, Resilient Cloud Applications <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/beyond-the-12-factor-app]]> - Cloud Foundry: The Cloud-Native Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/cloud-foundry-the-cloud-native-platform]]> - Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software]]> - Data Warehousing with Greenplum: Open Source Massively Parallel Data Analytics <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/data-warehousing-with-greenplum]]>
None of these strike your fancy? Check out our Resources Page <[[https://content.pivotal.io/resources]]> for a whole plethora of white papers, case studies, webinars, customer stories, and more.
Or, if you are tired of hearing from us, we understand - you can always unsubscribe from receiving these emails here <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html]]>.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
